abstract: Beagle Miss P wins Best in Show at the 2015 Westminster Kennel Club Show; is grandniece of Uno, who became first beagle ever to win premier event's Best in Show in 2008.
lead_paragraph: The Best in Show judge at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show made the surprising choice of Miss P, a grandniece of Uno, who in 2008 became the first beagle to win the big show.

headline.main: A Regal Beagle Seizes the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: A Regal Beagle Seizes the Spotlight
headline.seo: At Westminster Dog Show, Miss P, a Beagle, Wins Best in Show

snippet: The Best in Show judge at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show made the surprising choice of Miss P, a grandniece of Uno, who in 2008 became the first beagle to win the big show.
